tasks.instruction:
Revert the website back to the previous version before the premium Apple-style scrollytelling animations were implemented. This involves:

1. Remove or disable the recently added components:
   - PremiumScrollProvider.tsx
   - PremiumAboutSection.tsx
   - PremiumContactSection.tsx
   - SplitText.ts utility

2. Restore the previous version of:
   - EnhancedAboutSection.tsx
   - EnhancedContactSection.tsx
   - Any other files that were modified

3. Update the Index.tsx file to use the previous components instead of the premium ones

Working directory: /workspace/uploads/workspace/shadcn-ui/src
